title: 105_hr1258
content: Job Opportunity and Welfare Reduction Act of 1997 - Directs the Attorney General to conduct a temporary pilot program in States participating in the program under part A (TANF) of title IV of the Social Security Act. Requires the Attorney General to notify a State of potential employment opportunities for an adult TANF recipient arising from: (1) removal of an unauthorized alien from a work site by the Immigration and Naturalization Service. Or (2) the issuance by the Attorney General to an employer of an unauthorized work letter . Provides for a bonus under TANF to reward high-performing States.
